item.title: Airtable Expense Logging with Ledger Mode
item.description: Summary Many companies and organizations subsidize certain things like transit, food, and lodging for their employees, with the requirement that the latter log these expenses via some system defined by the Powers That Be. My company uses Airtable. 1 If you use Ledger to maintain your personal accounting, or really any other method for that matter (but seriously. Use Ledger), it can and will be tedious to log your subsidized/reimbursable expenses on both Ledger and Airtable.
